data.actual_result: It brings you to a random server
data.expected_result: Doesn't happen anywhere, else and shouldn't bring you into any other server
data.short_description: Adding a note and then pressing backspace brings you to a random server [Firefox Specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on Firefox - Open someone's profile - Click the note box - Type something - Press enter - Press backspace - Observe the background
